com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats

Interface IKandyImageItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IKandyFileItem, IKandyMediaItem
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IKandyAudioItem, IKandyVideoItem

    public interface IKandyImageItem
extends IKandyFileItem
    This interface is represents the Image file

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location getCapturedLocation()
      The latitude,longitude where the image was captured.
      long getDateTaken()
      The date & time that the image was taken in units of milliseconds - since jan 1, 1970
      long getHeight()
      The height of the image/video in pixels
      int getOrientation()
      The orientation for the image expressed as degrees (only the following degrees will work: 0, 90, 180, 270)
      long getWidth()
      The width of the image/video in pixels

      • Methods inherited from interface com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats.IKandyFileItem

        getDateAdded, getDateModified, getDisplayName, getFileExtension, getLocalDataUri, getLocalThumbnailUri, getMediaSize, getServerUUID, getTitle, getTransferProgress, setServerUUID

      • Methods inherited from interface com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats.IKandyMediaItem

        getAdditionalData, getMediaItemType, getMessage, getMimeType, setAdditionalData
